entry.dcterms:title: Educability and Primary School 1982. Factors in the educability of elementary school students in Zala county, their family socialization.
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-A74: Educability and Primary School 1982. Factors in the educability of elementary school students in Zala county, their family socialization.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Illyés, Sándor
entry.dcterms:contributor: Gusztáv Bárczi Training College for Special Education
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-02-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: comparing the samples of primary and auxiliary schools in the following dimensions: factors of children's educability (intelligence, ability to learn, knowledge level, study results), family socialization (social status, parents' IQ), factors of school education (characteristics of school and teacher)
entry.dcterms:subject: cultural and national identity
housing
social welfare policy and systems
health condition
economic conditions and indicators
income, property and savings
education, school
law, crime and legal systems
time use
local society, region
drug abuse, alcohol and smoking
psychology
demography
family life, marriage, relationship
social stratification and groupings
consumption/consumer behavior
equality and inequality
person
qualitative and quantitavie
cross-section
A 30% sample, representative of children in the first and second grade of regular primary schools, and first and second school grade children of the auxiliary schools of Zala county.
Questionnaires and psychological tests.
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
